title: Treaty of Fort Laramie (1868)
summary: The Treaty of Fort Laramie (also the Sioux Treaty of 1868[lower-alpha 2]) is an agreement between the United States and the Oglala, Miniconjou, and Brul√© bands of Lakota people, Yanktonai Dakota and Arapaho Nation, following the failure of the first Fort Laramie treaty, signed in 1851.
